0: while true; do ping localhost; sleep 60; done

cd /opt/cloudbeaver \
&& cp -R conf drivers run-server.sh samples server web /cb/ \
&& chown 1000:1000 -R /cb/* \
&& ls -lah /cb/

until [ -f /snapshots/kopia.repository.f ]; do
    printf "\e[1;32m%-6s\e[m\n" "Waiting for the Kopia repo to become ready ..."
    sleep 1
done
